column4: Can someone tell me how i can UN-flag a package as "automatically installed"?

i have installed openoffice.org 2.2 official from the openoffice.org site (because ubuntu's packages are broken!) and now about half of those packages, installed manually, say "automatically installed" and it keeps offering to remove them
by installing them manually they won't be marked as auto-installed, and so won't be auto-removed
i did install them manually in the first place. it says this anyway.
